item.title: Lithium stocks surge after Chinese mine suspends production
item.description: CATL suspended production at the Yichun Project after the mine's permit expired Saturday, the company told CNBC.

item.title: Cannabis stocks rally after Trump says he is weighing drug reclassification
item.description: Trump said he's considering reclassifying marijuana's danger level. That drove cannabis stocks up Monday.

item.title: The big opportunity in these tax-free bonds may be short lived â€” 'the ship is leaving the port,' says strategist
item.description: The opportunity to scoop up municipal bonds at attractive prices isn't going to stick around forever, according to strategist Tom Kozlik.

item.title: Walmart is set up well heading into earnings next week, says Katie Stockton
item.description: Fairlead Strategies' Katie Stockton breaks down Walmart's technical outlook ahead of earnings.

item.title: Best Stocks: These two major chip equipment stocks on our list are approaching new highs
item.description: Josh Brown and Sean Russo break down the sharp moves higher in these semiconductor equipment names.
